titleInfo.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 325, NO BUDGET, NO PAY ACT OF 2013

name.namePart: Committee on Education and the Workforce

extension.searchTitle: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 325, NO BUDGET, NO PAY ACT OF 2013; Congressional Record Vol. 159, No. 8

congVote.result: So the previous question was ordered.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: No Budget, No Pay Act of 2013
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 325, to ensure the complete and timely payment of the obligations of the United States Government until May 19, 2013, by a recorded vote of 285 ayes to 144 noes, Roll No. 30.<P/>Rejected the Murphy (FL) motion to recommit the bill to the Committee on Ways and Means with instructions to report the same back to the House forthwith with an amendment, by a yea-and-nay vote of 151 yeas to 277 nays, Roll No. 29.<P/>Pursuant to the rule, the amendment printed in H. Rept. 113092 shall be considered as adopted.<P/>H. Res. 39, the rule providing for consideration of the bill, was agreed to by a recorded vote of 234 ayes to 190 noes, Roll No. 27, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 232 yeas to 193 nays, Roll No. 26.

congVote.result: So the resolution was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: No Budget, No Pay Act of 2013
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 325, to ensure the complete and timely payment of the obligations of the United States Government until May 19, 2013, by a recorded vote of 285 ayes to 144 noes, Roll No. 30.<P/>Rejected the Murphy (FL) motion to recommit the bill to the Committee on Ways and Means with instructions to report the same back to the House forthwith with an amendment, by a yea-and-nay vote of 151 yeas to 277 nays, Roll No. 29.<P/>Pursuant to the rule, the amendment printed in H. Rept. 113092 shall be considered as adopted.<P/>H. Res. 39, the rule providing for consideration of the bill, was agreed to by a recorded vote of 234 ayes to 190 noes, Roll No. 27, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 232 yeas to 193 nays, Roll No. 26.

congCommittee.name: Committee on Education and the Workforce
Education and the Workforce

extension.searchTitle: THE JOURNAL; Congressional Record Vol. 159, No. 8

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to the Speaker's approval of the Journal by a yea-and-nay vote of 291 yeas to 129 nays with 2 answering ``present'', Roll No. 28.

titleInfo.title: NO BUDGET, NO PAY ACT OF 2013

extension.searchTitle: NO BUDGET, NO PAY ACT OF 2013; Congressional Record Vol. 159, No. 8

congVote.result: So the motion to recommit was rejected.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: No Budget, No Pay Act of 2013
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 325, to ensure the complete and timely payment of the obligations of the United States Government until May 19, 2013, by a recorded vote of 285 ayes to 144 noes, Roll No. 30.<P/>Rejected the Murphy (FL) motion to recommit the bill to the Committee on Ways and Means with instructions to report the same back to the House forthwith with an amendment, by a yea-and-nay vote of 151 yeas to 277 nays, Roll No. 29.<P/>Pursuant to the rule, the amendment printed in H. Rept. 113092 shall be considered as adopted.

congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: No Budget, No Pay Act of 2013
No Budget, No Pay Act of 2013
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 325, to ensure the complete and timely payment of the obligations of the United States Government until May 19, 2013, by a recorded vote of 285 ayes to 144 noes, Roll No. 30.

The House passed H.R. 325, to ensure the complete and timely payment of the obligations of the United States Government until May 19, 2013, by a recorded vote of 285 ayes to 144 noes, Roll No. 30.<P/>Rejected the Murphy (FL) motion to recommit the bill to the Committee on Ways and Means with instructions to report the same back to the House forthwith with an amendment, by a yea-and-nay vote of 151 yeas to 277 nays, Roll No. 29.<P/>Pursuant to the rule, the amendment printed in H. Rept. 113092 shall be considered as adopted.
